roleset.name: to name, call by a certain name
roleset.note: Roleset based on instances in BOLT-P01, nouns parts 1 & 2. Comparison to name.01. No FrameNet entry.

example.name: Arg2 only
example.text: The appellation of ' rapist ' is stigmatising enough ; the scum who rape people clearly do n't care about the consequences .

example.name: All arguments
example.text: But I sense a tinge of underlying disrespect and arrogance toward Wone in her constant appellation of him as “Bobo.”
